|brand = Banana Pi |model = BPI P2 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Pro |revision = V1.1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/12/2023 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Banana_Pi_BPI_P2_Pro |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3308B;RK3308B-S; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A35 |cpu1spd = 1.3 GHz<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646F-BYMA; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 2.0 (Type-C), Micro SD Card slot |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = USB (Type-C) Female
|serial = yes,, via 12-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (1500000 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Micro SD Card slot, Audio out (3.5mm), PoE in, SPDIF, I2S, I2C, GPIO |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SinoVoIP |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2023 |estprice = 32 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B0CHRT586M |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = SparkLAN AP6256 |rad1modif = SDIO 3.0 |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43456; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 433 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Rockchip]] RK3308 @1.3GHz :Quad-core ARM (Cortex-A35) *Storage: 8GB (eMMC) Flash, :TF card (max.256GB)/MMC card slot *Memory: 512MB (DDR3) SDRAM *USB: 1x USB 2.0, 1x USB Type-C (OTG) ports *Wi-Fi: [[AMPAK]] AP6256 (BT 5.0, 802.11ac) *Network: 1x FE port w/ 802.3af PoE *GPIO: 1x 40-pin connector *Power Source: 5V/2A via USB (Type-C) :or 802.3af PoE
==Links of Interest== *[https://wiki.banana-pi.org/Banana_Pi_BPI-P2_Pro ''Banana Pi BPI-P2 Pro'' on '''BPi''' Wiki] *[https://liliputing.com/banana-pi-bpi-p2-pro-is-a-tiny-headless-computer-with-poe-wifi-bluetooth-and-an-audio-jack/ ''Banana Pi BPI-P2 Pro is a tiny headless computer'' on '''Lilliputing'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2023/03/08/banana-pi-bpi-p2-pro-rockchip-rk3308-smart-audio/ ''Banana BPI-P2 Pro headless SBC features RK3308 CPU'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://linuxgizmos.com/banana-pi-board-equipped-with-quad-core-rockchip-rk3308b-s/ ''Banana Pi board equipped with Quad-core Rockchip RK3308B-S'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
==See also== {{Project:Network/Banana Pi models}}
